movies.title: The Flash
movies.description: Barry Allen uses his super speed to change the past, which brings unintended consequences to his timeline.

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
movies.description: The Guardians are back and must face new challenges as they navigate the cosmic universe and battle an old foe.

movies.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
movies.description: Jake Sully and Neytiri must protect their family from new threats on Pandora.

movies.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Spider-Man seeks help from Doctor Strange to erase the memory of his secret identity from the world, which leads to disastrous consequences.

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control of the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

movies.title: The Matrix Resurrections
movies.description: Thomas Anderson, a computer programmer, is forced to question reality as he uncovers secrets about the Matrix.

movies.title: Black Widow
movies.description: Natasha Romanoff confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises.

movies.title: The Suicide Squad
movies.description: A group of supervillains are sent on a mission to the dangerous island of Corto Maltese, facing enemies, death, and redemption.

movies.title: Eternals
movies.description: A team of ancient superheroes must come together to defend Earth from an ancient evil.

movies.title: F9: The Fast Saga
movies.description: Dominic Toretto and his crew face a new challenge as they come up against Dom's estranged brother.

movies.title: Jungle Cruise
movies.description: A jungle guide and a scientist embark on a dangerous journey through the Amazon jungle to find a mystical tree.

movies.title: No Time to Die
movies.description: James Bond comes out of retirement to face a new threat from a villain with dangerous technology.

movies.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
movies.description: Shang-Chi must confront his past when the mysterious Ten Rings organization reappears in his life.

movies.title: Cruella
movies.description: A young Estella, a fashion-obsessed orphan, transforms into the iconic villain Cruella de Vil.
